p: Each strain was grown in liquid nutrient broth at 37 °C for 18 h before being used for antimicrobial tests. The microbial load was adjusted to 10 8 Colony-Forming Units (CFU)/mL using a 0.5 McFarland turbidity standard, after that, the suspension was diluted to obtain an inoculum of 10 6 CFU∙mL −1.
